import React, {PureComponent} from 'react'; import Icofont from 'react-icofont'; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from "./Sidebar"; export default class BlogPost extends PureComponent { render() { //BlogPost loop start const blogpostdata = this.props.blogpostsData.map((blogpost, index) => (
{blogpost.date} {blogpost.month}

{blogpost.posttitle}

  • Posted By: {blogpost.authorName}
  • Comments: {blogpost.TotalComments}
  • Tags: {blogpost.TagName}

{blogpost.postContent}

)); //BlogPost loop END return (
{blogpostdata}
  • Previous

{/*Sidebar: src/components/blog/Sidebar.jsx*/}
); } } //Props Types BlogPost.propTypes = { blogpostsData: PropTypes.array }; //Default Props BlogPost.defaultProps = { blogpostsData: [ { postImage: require("../../images/design-01.jpg"), postLink: "/blog-details", date: "25", month: "Feb", posttitle: "Risus commodo viverra maecenas accumsan.", postContent: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam fermentum sagittis nulla, non vehicula mauris rutrum vitae. Sed non consequat dolor. Cras in odio augue.", authorName: "Jone", authorLink: "/#0", TotalComments: "06", CommentsLink: "/#0", TagName: "lifestyle", TagLink: "/#0", }, { postImage: require("../../images/design-01.jpg"), postLink: "/blog-details", date: "25", month: "Feb", posttitle: "10 hot marketing trends you need.", postContent: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam fermentum sagittis nulla, non vehicula mauris rutrum vitae. Sed non consequat dolor.
